form.subtitle: Mirror Configuration

url.label: Url
url.helpText: The url of the repository that should be mirrored. This url cannot be changed once the mirror has been created.

password.label: Password
password.helpText: The password for the provided user.

certificate.label: Certificate with Key (PKCS12)
certificate.helpText: A PKCS12 keystore for securing the connection.

password.label: Password
password.helpText: If present, the password for the keystore.

period.label: Refresh Period
period.helpText: The periodic interval at which the scm-manager re-fetches repository data.

syncDisabled.label: Disable periodical synchronization
syncDisabled.helpText: No automatic synchronizations will be executed when this is checked.

managingUsers.label: Emergency Contacts
managingUsers.helpText: These users will be notified whenever mirroring fails.

keyList.emptyNotification: No keys defined yet, please add at least one

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.helpText: A descriptive name for the key.

raw.label: Raw
raw.helpText: The raw key. Simply copy & paste it into this field.

gpgVerificationType.label: GPG Verification
gpgVerificationType.helpText: Define if or how signatures on commits and tags should be validated.

httpsOnly.label: HTTPS Only
httpsOnly.helpText: Only allow https for mirror connections. Disables the use of unsecured http connections.

branchesAndTagsPatterns.label: Branches and Tags
branchesAndTagsPatterns.helpText: Comma-separated glob patterns describing which branches and/or tags should be mirrored. If left blank, all branches and tags will be mirrored.

form.verificationFiltersHint: These filters have no effects for mirrors of SVN repositories.

fastForwardOnly.label: Fast-Forward Only
fastForwardOnly.helpText: Only apply changes to branches, which resulted from a fast-forward.

disableRepositoryFilterOverwrite.label: Do not allow repository filter overwrite
disableRepositoryFilterOverwrite.helpText: Do not allow repository owners to overwrite the mirror filters.

overwriteGlobalConfiguration.label: Overwrite Global Filter Configuration
overwriteGlobalConfiguration.helpText: Replaces the global filter configuration for this repository.

overwriteGlobalConfiguration.label: Overwrite Global Proxy Configuration
overwriteGlobalConfiguration.helpText: Replaces the global proxy configuration for this repository.

host.label: Host
host.helpText: The host name of the proxy server.

errors.invalid: The provided value has to be a valid host name

errors.range: The provided value has to be a number between 1 and 65535

username.label: Username
username.helpText: The username to authenticate with the proxy server if required.

password.label: Password
password.helpText: The password for the provided proxy user.

mirror.description: May modify the global mirror configuration

*.description: May modify the repository specific mirror configuration for all repositories

mirror.description: May modify the repository specific mirror configurations

23SZx2QZE1.description: Mirror connections are globally configured as https-only, but the provided url is not secure.

mirrorStatusChanged.label: State changes of mirrored repositories
mirrorStatusChanged.helpText: Mails for changed states of mirrored repositories, eg. on the first failure or after a synchronization was successful again.
